mapper.insert: insert into su_user (user_id, role_id, username, real_name, password, password_salt, staff_id, create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time, status) values (#{userId}, #{roleId}, #{username}, #{realName}, #{password}, #{passwordSalt}, #{staffId}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{modifyUser}, #{modifyTime}, #{status})
mapper.select:
select * from (select tt.*, rownum as rowno from (select * from su_user where status = 1
and username like concat(concat('%', #{username}), '%')
and staff_id like concat(concat('%', #{staffId}), '%')
order by create_time desc ) tt where rownum <= #{pageSize}) table_alias where table_alias.rowno > #{startIndex}
